mle.ingest_data module

mle.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(dataset_path=None, housing_path='datasets/housing', housing_url='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ageron/handson-ml/master/datasets/housing/housing.tgz', processed_data_path=None)[source]

Function to fetch housing data through function.

Parameters

  • dataset_path (str) – path of dataset

  • housing_path (str) – housing path

  • housing_url (str) – housing url path

  • processed_data_path (str) – path where your processed dataset will be created

Return type

processed datasets
